about.title: Welcome to Anny Spa
about.desc: Everybody is looking for places where to relax and get more energy.In our wellness center silence, energy, beauty and vitality meet. The treatments we offer will refresh both your body and soul. We'll be glad to welcome you and recommend our facilities and services.

service.title: Services
service.description: Relaxation of bodu and mind in which time does not exist

aroma.title: Aroma Therapy
aroma.desc: Give yourself the ultimate home spa experience with a type of therapy that uses gentle pressure on specific points along your feet (and possibly on your hands or ears as well) to help you feel better. The theory is that this eases stress, and that helps your body work better.

reviews.title: Amazing place!
reviews.review: The service was impeccable and the staff was the best we've met. Thank you from the bottom.

reviews.title: BEST massage
reviews.review: The BEST massage I have ever had, every time I call Rela Spa to my private venue for body work!

reviews.title: Wonderful vacation
reviews.review: Thank you! We have had a wonderful vacation at your heavenly resort. You are precious.

footer.title: Anny Spa
footer.desc: Care for your body and soul
